GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Sanity check block descriptor length in resp_mode_select()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.168 by commit b847ecff850719c46c95acd25a0d555dfd16e10d. For more details please see the references link.
